SA11sanss09u:1_0: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥś-lyôtpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmâvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta /
SA11sanss09u:9_0: tatrâpi vikṣepapraśamanânabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti /
SA11sanss09u:11_0: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti /
SA11sanss09u:26_0: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkha daurmanasyôpāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatîti //
SA11sanss09u:29_0: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenânunayapratighâpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmânanuliptena /
SA11sanss09u:30_0: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nônnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:32_0: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cânena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:41_0: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim /
SA11sanss09u:44_0: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ //
SA11sanss09u:51_0: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya /
SA11sanss09u:54_0: na câbhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti /
SA11sanss09u:55_0: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahāraka-
SA11sanss09u:57_0: kaivartakarṣakâdīnāṃ duṣkhâbhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇâṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate /
SA11sanss09u:59_0: tathā prākṛtâpi kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenâiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanâpi saṃgrāmayanty eva /
SA11sanss09u:60_0_0: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālâpakāriṣu duṣkhôpāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nâvadhyaghātakeṣu bhavacārakapālakeṣu niḥsaraṇadvāradignāśakeṣv
SA11sanss09u:60_0_1: ānukūlye 'pi dṛḍhataravādhākareṣv anapakṛtavairiṣv anavadhikalpâbaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ
SA11sanss09u:64_0: tathā sarvaduṣkhôtpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānâbhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA11sanss09u:65_0: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratila-
SA11sanss09u:70_0: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvârambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate /
SA11sanss09u:72_0: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:73_0: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:74_0: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyârddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃ-
SA11sanss09u:80_0: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vâdīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA11sanss09u:81_0: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya //
SA11sanss09u:83_0: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
SA11sanss09u:84_0: akṣiṇy-utpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vâghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñâiva pravartate /
SA11sanss09u:88_0: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ caratâitat praṇidhānam abhūt /
SA11sanss09u:93_0: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:94_0: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇâchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:97_0: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvânugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti /
SA11sanss09u:98_0: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhâkrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate /
SA11sanss09u:99_0: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhâkrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye 'kṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ /
SA11sanss09u:110_0: yāvad dharmânusmaraṇāt prītiḥ prasādaḥ prāmodyaṃ cittasyânavalīnatânavamṛdyatâparitarṣaṇā /
SA11sanss09u:112_0: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyâudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasôtplavaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:153_0: iti hi yā sarvêndriyeṣv anavalīnêndriyatêyam ucyate muditêty ādi //
SA11sanss09u:154_0: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe /
SA11sanss09u:155_0: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti /
SA11sanss09u:156_0: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayâgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantîti //
SA11sanss09u:160_0: anāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārâdhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato /
SA11sanss09u:174_0: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate /
SA11sanss09u:190_0: sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:191_0_0: yatrâiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ
SA11sanss09u:191_0_1: vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ vôtpādayiṣyati tatrâsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas /
SA11sanss09u:192_0_0: te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitânarthakarmāṇaḥ
SA11sanss09u:192_0_1: śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ /
SA11sanss09u:193_0: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyântike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:195_0_0: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyâpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyâpi tiryagyonigatasyâpi yamalokagatasyâpi manuṣyagatasyâpi
SA11sanss09u:195_0_1: kāmâhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamâjīvagocarasya nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto
SA11sanss09u:195_0_2: vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmârthaṃ kṛto na parârthaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:196_0: sacet punar punar mamâite sarvasatvâparântakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathâpi mayâparityaktâiva sarvajñatā /
SA11sanss09u:205_0: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
SA11sanss09u:207_0: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvârambaṇā mahākaruṇā //
SA11sanss09u:214_0: evaṃ dharmagaṇanâviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate //
SA11sanss09u:218_0: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
SA11sanss09u:221_0: yat kāye chidyamāne yâivâsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣârthaṃ kṣamate /
SA11sanss09u:222_0: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ côpadarśayatîyam asya kṣāntipāramitā //
SA11sanss09u:223_0: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ nôtsṛjati cittabalâdhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti /
SA11sanss09u:227_0: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittôtpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evâpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate /
SA11sanss09u:229_0: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsôpamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyâvatarati /
SA11sanss09u:230_0: bhūtânityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtânātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyôpanidhyāyati /
SA11sanss09u:238_0: eṣâiva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:243_0: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām anupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnŌühŌüḥ saṃnaddhavyŌüḥ //
SA11sanss09u:256_0: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi /
SA11sanss09u:257_0: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe /
SA11sanss09u:261_0: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nâghātayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:262_0: pareṣām antike na mamâitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣântaraṃ saṃjanayeyam /
SA11sanss09u:263_0: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣântaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye /
SA11sanss09u:265_0: na mayâśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhôpadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cânuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmâhaṃ vyāpadye /
SA11sanss09u:266_0: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ /
SA11sanss09u:270_0: na mayā jīvitântarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11sanss09u:273_0: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati /
